cz.vojtechvondra.schemawizard

Class AttributeModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.vojtechvondra.schemawizard.AttributeModel

  • public class AttributeModel
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of attributes and functional dependencies Dependency rules may contain additional implied attributes Contains several algorithms for determining properties of a database schema

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Vector<java.util.HashSet<Attribute>> findAllModelKeys()
      Find all the keys for the model A key is a set of attributes which define all other attributes Works by creating a dependency from the full attribute set to the full attribute set and removing redundant attributes from the left side
      java.util.HashSet<Attribute> findAttributeClosure()
      Calculates transitive closure of selected attributes with regard to functional dependencies Returns attributes implied by rules but not included in attributes as well
      java.util.HashSet<Attribute> findModelKey()
      Find a key (random) for the model A key is a set of attributes which define all other attributes Works by creating a dependency from the full attribute set to the full attribute set and removing redundant attributes from the left side

      • isDependencyInClosure

        public boolean isDependencyInClosure(FunctionalDependency dep)
        Checks if the specified dependency can be deduced from the closure of existing dependencies
        Parameters:
        dep - Dependecy to check membership in closure for
        Returns:
        true if dependency is part of closure

        Returns:
        Copy of the rule with the reduced left side

      • findModelKey

        public java.util.HashSet<Attribute> findModelKey()
        Find a key (random) for the model A key is a set of attributes which define all other attributes Works by creating a dependency from the full attribute set to the full attribute set and removing redundant attributes from the left side
        Returns:
        a set of attributes making a key

      • findAllModelKeys

        public java.util.Vector<java.util.HashSet<Attribute>> findAllModelKeys()

        Returns:
        a set of attributes making a key
